text: Na khambhakato antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na khambhakato antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 21. I will not go with arms akimbo in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๒๑. พึงทำศึกษาว่า”เราจักไม่ทำความค้ำไปในละแวกบ้าน”
21. I shall not go with arms akimbo in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
